data.eml:eml: Eight new species of Strongylophthalmyia Heller from Vietnam with a key to species from Vietnam and neighbouring countries (Diptera, Strongylophthalmyiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Galinskaya, Tatiana V., Shatalkin, Anatoly I. (2016): Eight new species of Strongylophthalmyia Heller from Vietnam with a key to species from Vietnam and neighbouring countries (Diptera, Strongylophthalmyiidae). ZooKeys 625: 111-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.625.8711, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.625.8711
